title: @Targons Blade, Is getting hextech key fragments by playing free week champions still not working?
body:
Any info on that?

I also want to express gratitude for your selfless response spree.

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find any announcement on this being resolved, so it seems this is still ongoing. I don't work on the team that would be developing a fix for this, so I don't have any other details to offer, unfortunately.

If you have any other questions, let me know and I'll do my best to answer them. ^.^
